post_text: March 20, 2015 at 7:49â€¯PM#1HiDoes anybody know if it is possible to count the number of selected channels/fixtures in a macro?- E.g. a function that would return 3 if channels 5, 8 and 12 is selected.I would like to save it as a variable for looping purposes, so that I can have a loop run x times depending on how many channels is selected.Thanks, Mads
title: Count number of selected channels
